DOC.brief_summary: The objective project develop , validate , implement tool help manager hypertension patient hemodialysis .
DOC.brief_title: Use Hypertension Tool Manage Blood Pressure Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: ≥ 18 year age Receiving incentre HD least 3 month Considered hypertensive base median intradialytic blood pressure ≥ 140/90 mmgHG Are unable provide inform consent Are deem medically unstable primary physician
